title: UAAPS RULE.md Frontmatter
description: Schema for the YAML frontmatter block in rules/<name>/RULE.md files.

description.description: Purpose of this rule. Used by agents for auto-selection. Be specific about what coding standards or conventions this rule enforces.

globs.description: Glob pattern(s) for automatic attachment. The rule is injected into context whenever a matching file is opened or edited. Example: 'src/**/*.{ts,tsx}'.

alwaysApply.description: When true, the rule is always included in context regardless of the files being worked on. Default: false.
